H0.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Abaya

H1.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Jilbab

H2.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. Niqab

H3.text: what is the name of the muslim dress. hijab

A4.text: The abaya is a simple, loose over-garment, essentially a robe-like dress, worn by some women in the Muslim world including most of the Middle East, North Africa, and parts of the Horn of Africa.

A5.text: In Indonesia, the abaya takes on a unique style called the 'jilbab.'

A6.text: The term jilbāb refers to any long and loose-fit coat or outer garment worn by Muslim women.

A7.text: In Indonesia, the term jilbāb refers to a headscarf rather than a long and loose overgarment.
